pair.value: Validates car sales with incentive requirements

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:value: Sale does not meet incentive requirements.

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Hello ",user(pp!initiator, "firstName") & user(pp!initiator, "lastName"),"


Your sale ",pv!salesData.title,"does not comply with incentive ",#"4028f35e-5814-4e3e-ab7f-f077d3d17e12_GETONERECORD"(pv!incentive).title,". A task has been created if you would like to dispute this claim.

Thanks,

Incentives Administrator
")

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:value: Sale does not meet incentive requirements.

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Hello ",user(pp!initiator, "firstName") & " " & user(pp!initiator, "lastName"),"


Your sale ",pv!salesData.title," does not comply with incentive ",#"4028f35e-5814-4e3e-ab7f-f077d3d17e12_GETONERECORD"(pv!incentive).title,". A task has been created if you would like to dispute this claim.

Thanks,

Incentives Administrator
")

uiExpressionForm.expression: /*41707069616E-GEN*/#"_a-0000dfd8-6941-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_202391"( id: pv!salesData.id, readOnly: false, errorCode: ac!errorCode, comment: ac!comment, salesData: ac!salesData )

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:value: Sale does not meet incentive requirements.

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Hello ",user(pp!initiator, "firstName") & user(pp!initiator, "lastName"),"


Your sale ",pv!salesData.title,"does comply with incentive ",#"4028f35e-5814-4e3e-ab7f-f077d3d17e12_GETONERECORD"(pv!incentive).title,". The sale will be processed and you will be notified when it is complete.

Thanks,

Incentives Administrator")

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:value: Sale does not meet incentive requirements.

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

Hello ",user(pp!initiator, "firstName") & user(pp!initiator, "lastName"),"


Your sale ",pv!salesData.title,"does comply with incentive ",#"4028f35e-5814-4e3e-ab7f-f077d3d17e12_GETONERECORD"(pv!incentive).title,". The sale will be processed and you will be notified when it is complete.

Thanks,

Incentives Administrator")
